metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
40:29 – Banana with apple, walking distance to work, uncooperative throat coughing and iOS 10 upgrades, never using Apple 1.0 releases, going to NYC and Philly, the Kobo, the US ESTA, the Clinton Trump debate, becoming an Olympus camera guy again, and a friggen vanishing iPad!

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released October 2016 on Rubénerd and The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.

Special thanks to the Internet Archive; their generous hosting makes this show possible.
